Field.FormMenuDescription: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self Admin
Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: We are interested in finding out about the kinds of physical activities that people do as part of their everyday lives. The questions will ask you about the time you spent being physically active in the <font color="blue"><u>last 7 days</u></font>. Please answer each question even if you do not consider yourself to be an active person. Please think about the activities you do at work, as part of your house and yard work, to get from place to place, and in your spare time for recreation, exercise or sport. Think about all the <font color="blue">vigorous </font>and <font color="blue">moderate </font>activities that you did in the <font color="blue"><u>last 7 days</u></font>. <font color="blue">Vigorous </font>physical activities refer to activities that take hard physical effort and make you breathe much harder than normal. <font color="blue">Moderate </font>activities refer to activities that take moderate physical effort and make you breathe somewhat harder than normal.
Field.ElementLabel:
PART 1: JOB-RELATED PHYSICAL ACTIVITY

The first section is about your work. This includes paid jobs, farming, volunteer work, course work, and any other unpaid work that you did outside your home. Do not include unpaid work you might do around your home, like housework, yard work, general maintenance, and caring for your family. These are asked in Part 3.
1. Do you currently have a job or do any unpaid work outside your home?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 2, No > Skip to PART 2: TRANSPORTATION

Field.ElementLabel: The next questions are about all the physical activity you did in the <font color="blue">last 7 days </font>as part of your paid or unpaid work. This does not include traveling to and from work.

2. During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, heavy construction, or climbing up stairs as part of your work?

Think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No vigorous job-related physical activity > Skip to question 4

StructuredValue.Value: No vigorous job-related physical activity > Skip to question 4

Field.ElementLabel: 3. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">vigorous</font> physical activities as part of your work?
hours per day
minutes per day

4. Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you do <font color = "blue">moderate</font> physical activities like carrying light loads <font color = "blue">as part of your work</font>? Please do not include walking.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No moderate job-related physical activity > Skip to question 6

StructuredValue.Value: No moderate job-related physical activity > Skip to question 6

Field.ElementLabel: 5. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">moderate</font> physical activities as part of your work?
hours per day
minutes per day

6. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you <font color = "blue">walk</font> for at least 10 minutes at a time <font color = "blue">as part of your work</font>? Please do not count any walking you did to travel to or from work.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No job-related walking > Skip to PART 2: TRANSPORTATION

StructuredValue.Value: No job-related walking > Skip to PART 2: TRANSPORTATION

Field.ElementLabel: 7. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days <font color = "blue">walking</font> as part of your work?
hours per day
minutes per day

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: PART 2: TRANSPORTATION PHYSICAL ACTIVITY These questions are about how you traveled from place to place, including to places like work, stores, movies, and so on.
Field.ElementLabel: 8. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you <font color = "blue">travel in a motor vehicle</font> like a train, bus, car or tram?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No traveling in a motor vehicle > Skip to question 10

StructuredValue.Value: No traveling in a motor vehicle > Skip to question 10

Field.ElementLabel: 9. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days <font color = "blue">traveling</font> in a train, bus, car, tram, or other kind of motor vehicle?
hours per day
minutes per day
Now think only about the <font color = "blue">bicycling</font> and <font color = "blue">walking</font> you might have done to travel to and from work, to do errands, or to go from place to place.

10. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you <font color = "blue">bicycle</font> for at least 10 minutes at a time to go <font color = "blue">from place to place</font>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No bicycling from place to place > Skip to question 12

StructuredValue.Value: No bicycling from place to place > Skip to question 12

Field.ElementLabel: 11. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days to <font color = "blue">bicycle</font> from place to place?
hours per day
minutes per day

12. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you <font color = "blue">walk</font> for at least 10 minutes at a time to go <font color = "blue">from place to place</font>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No walking from place to place > Skip to PART 3: HOUSEWORK, HOUSE MAINTENANCE, AND CARING FOR FAMILY

StructuredValue.Value: No walking from place to place > Skip to PART 3: HOUSEWORK

Field.ElementLabel: 13. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days <font color = "blue">walking </font> from place to place?
hours per day
minutes per day

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: PART 3: HOUSEWORK, HOUSE MAINTENANCE, AND CARING FOR FAMILY This section is about some of the physical activities you might have done in the last 7 days in and around your home, like housework, gardening, yard work, general maintenance work, and caring for your family.
Field.ElementLabel: 14. Think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, chopping wood, shoveling snow, or digging in the garden or yard?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No vigorous activity in garden or yard > Skip to question 16

StructuredValue.Value: No vigorous activity in garden or yard > Skip to question 16

Field.ElementLabel: 15. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">vigorous</font> physical activities in the garden or yard?
hours per day
minutes per day

16. Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate activities like carrying light loads, sweeping, washing windows, and raking in the garden or yard?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No moderate activity in garden or yard > Skip to question 18

StructuredValue.Value: No moderate activity in garden or yard > Skip to question 18

Field.ElementLabel: 17. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">moderate </font>physical activities in the garden or yard?
hours per day
minutes per day

18. Once again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you do <font color = "blue">moderate</font> activities like carrying light loads, washing windows, scrubbing floors and sweeping <font color = "blue">inside your home</font>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No moderate activity inside home > Skip to PART 4: RECREATION, SPORT AND LEISURE-TIME PHYSICAL ACTIVITY

StructuredValue.Value: No moderate activity inside home > Skip to PART 4: RECREATION

Field.ElementLabel: 19. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">moderate</font> physical activities inside your home?
hours per day
minutes per day

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: PART 4: RECREATION, SPORT, AND LEISURE-TIME PHYSICAL ACTIVITY This section is about all the physical activities that you did in the last 7 days solely for recreation, sport, exercise or leisure. Please do not include any activities you have already mentioned.
Field.ElementLabel: 20. Not counting any walking you have already mentioned, during the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you <font color = "blue">walk</font> for at least 10 minutes at a time <font color = "blue">in your leisure time</font>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No walking in leisure time > Skip to question 22

StructuredValue.Value: No walking in leisure time > Skip to question 22

Field.ElementLabel: 21. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days <font color = "blue">walking </font>in your leisure time?
hours per day
minutes per day

22. Think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you do <font color = "blue">vigorous </font>physical activities like aerobics, running, fast bicycling, or fast swimming <font color = "blue">in your leisure time</font>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No vigorous activity in leisure time > Skip to question 24

StructuredValue.Value: No vigorous activity in leisure time > Skip to question 24

Field.ElementLabel: 23. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">vigorous </font>physical activities in your leisure time?
hours per day
minutes per day

24. Again, think about only those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, on how many days did you do <font color = "blue">moderate </font>physical activities like bicycling at a regular pace, swimming at a regular pace, and doubles tennis <font color = "blue">in your leisure time</font>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1 day per week 
 2, 2 days per week 
 3, 3 days per week 
 4, 4 days per week 
 5, 5 days per week 
 6, 6 days per week 
 7, 7 days per week 
 0, No moderate activity in leisure time > Skip to PART 5: TIME SPENT SITTING

StructuredValue.Value: No moderate activity in leisure time > Skip to PART 5: TIME SPENT SITTING

Field.ElementLabel: 25. How much time did you usually spend on one of those days doing <font color = "blue">moderate </font>physical activities in your leisure time?
hours per day
minutes per day

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: PART 5: TIME SPENT SITTING The last questions are about the time you spend sitting while at work, at home, while doing course work and during leisure time. This may include time spent sitting at a desk, visiting friends, reading or sitting or lying down to watch television. Do not include any time spent sitting in a motor vehicle that you have already told me about.
Field.ElementLabel: 26. During the <font color = "blue">last 7 days</font>, how much time did you usually spend <font color = "blue">sitting </font>on a <font color = "blue">weekday</font>?
hours per day
minutes per day

27. During the last 7 days, how much time did you usually spend sitting on a weekend
day?
hours per day
minutes per day
This is the end of the questionnaire, thank you for participating.
